title: The One With the Two Bullies

questions.question: Why is Monica watching the business channel?
options: She's looking for a new job
She's watching a stock with her initials, MEG
She's trying to learn about finance
She's waiting for a specific news report
questions.correct_answer: She's watching a stock with her initials, MEG
questions.explanation: Monica is watching the business channel because she saw a stock with her initials, MEG, and wants to keep track of it.

questions.question: What is Phoebe's sign to go see her father?
options: A series of coincidences involving her father's last name and first name
A phone call from a friend
questions.correct_answer: A series of coincidences involving her father's last name and first name
questions.explanation: Phoebe believes that a series of coincidences, including seeing a buffet with her father's last name and franks (her father's first name minus the 's'), are signs that she should go see her father.

questions.question: Why do the bullies take Chandler's hat?
options: Because they want to annoy Chandler
Because they think it's a funny joke
Because they want to start a fight
questions.correct_answer: Because they think it's a funny joke
questions.explanation: The little bully takes Chandler's hat and puts it on himself, saying 'I just took your hat. See, I can be funny too. My, my joke is that I, I took your hat.'

questions.question: What does Monica have to do if she takes the job at the 50's theme restaurant?
options: Cook in a costume and dance on the counter
questions.correct_answer: Cook in a costume and dance on the counter
questions.explanation: Monica says that if she takes the job at the 50's theme restaurant, she'll have to 'cook in a costume and dance on the counter'.

questions.question: What happens to the dog when Phoebe returns it to her father's house?
options: The dog is happy to see Phoebe
The dog has 8 stitches and a plastic cone around its neck
questions.correct_answer: The dog has 8 stitches and a plastic cone around its neck
questions.explanation: When Phoebe returns the dog to her father's house, the dog has 8 stitches and a plastic cone around its neck due to an accident.

questions.question: Why does Ross want to go back to Central Perk with Chandler?
options: To prove a point to the bullies
To show off his fighting skills
questions.correct_answer: To prove a point to the bullies
questions.explanation: Ross wants to go back to Central Perk with Chandler to prove a point to the bullies and stand up for themselves.

questions.question: What do the bullies and Ross and Chandler agree not to hit during their fight?
options: Below the waist and above the neck
questions.correct_answer: Faces and below the waist
questions.explanation: The bullies and Ross and Chandler agree not to hit faces and below the waist during their fight, with the big bully adding that they shouldn't hit faces because Ross has a big presentation at work and the little bully has an apartment to show, and below the waist because the big bully's wife is ovulating.

questions.question: What does Phoebe learn about her father from her half-brother?
questions.correct_answer: He loves stilts
questions.explanation: Phoebe learns from her half-brother that her father loves stilts and even used to walk around the house on them, making him very happy.

questions.question: Why does Monica need to borrow $100 from Rachel?
options: To pay for a new dress
To invest in the stock market
To pay for a new job
questions.correct_answer: To invest in the stock market
questions.explanation: Monica needs to borrow $100 from Rachel because she lost all her money in the stock market and wants to get back in the game.

questions.question: What does Monica have to wear as part of her job at the 50's theme restaurant?
questions.correct_answer: Flame retardant boobs
questions.explanation: Monica mentions that she doesn't want to wear 'flame retardant boobs' as part of her job at the 50's theme restaurant.

questions.question: Why does Joey offer to call Phoebe's father?
options: Because he wants to meet Phoebe's father
Because he feels sorry for Phoebe
Because he wants to help Phoebe
questions.correct_answer: Because he wants to help Phoebe
questions.explanation: Joey offers to call Phoebe's father because he wants to help Phoebe and make things easier for her.

questions.question: What does Phoebe's half-brother offer to show her?
options: Where their father hit his head on the rain gutter
questions.correct_answer: Where their father hit his head on the rain gutter
questions.explanation: Phoebe's half-brother offers to show her where their father hit his head on the rain gutter, a story related to their father's love of stilts.

questions.question: What happens when Chandler and Ross try to drink their cappuccino with a 'K'?
questions.correct_answer: They burn their mouths
questions.explanation: Chandler and Ross try to drink their cappuccino with a 'K' but end up burning their mouths because they can't stir it properly.

questions.question: What does Ross say to the bullies before they start fighting?
options: You want a piece of this?
questions.correct_answer: You want a piece of this?
questions.explanation: Ross says 'You want a piece of this?' to the bullies before they start fighting, trying to sound tough.

questions.question: What do the bullies and Ross and Chandler have to put in a hat before they start fighting?
questions.correct_answer: Their watches and keys
questions.explanation: The bullies and Ross and Chandler have to put their watches and keys in a hat before they start fighting, as agreed upon by both parties.

questions.question: What happens to the hat with the watches and keys?
questions.correct_answer: Someone runs off with it
questions.explanation: As the bullies and Ross and Chandler are about to start fighting, someone runs off with the hat containing their watches and keys.

questions.question: Why does Phoebe want to meet her father in person?
options: Because she wants to talk to him
Because she wants to see him
Because she doesn't want to meet him over the phone
Because she wants to give him a gift
questions.correct_answer: Because she doesn't want to meet him over the phone
questions.explanation: Phoebe wants to meet her father in person because she doesn't want to meet him over the phone, especially after running over his dog.

questions.question: What does Monica buy with her $127?
questions.correct_answer: Stocks in CHP and ZXY
questions.explanation: Monica buys stocks in CHP and ZXY with her $127, explaining that she chose those stocks because she used to have a crush on Eric Estrada and because ZXY sounds 'zexy'.

questions.question: What does Joey say about his sandwich after the dog ignores it?
options: If he's not gonna eat it, I will
questions.correct_answer: If he's not gonna eat it, I will
questions.explanation: Joey says 'If he's not gonna eat it, I will' after the dog ignores his sandwich, showing that he still wants to eat it.

questions.question: What does Phoebe say about her family situation?
options: She has a lot of siblings
She has no family left except for her grandmother
She has a close relationship with her parents
questions.correct_answer: She has no family left except for her grandmother
questions.explanation: Phoebe says that she has no family left except for her grandmother, and that her grandmother won't be around forever, which is why she wants to meet her father.

questions.question: What does Chandler say about his cappuccino with a 'K'?
options: It's not mixing with the water
questions.correct_answer: It's not mixing with the water
questions.explanation: Chandler says that his cappuccino with a 'K' is not mixing with the water, which is why they have to constantly stir it.

questions.question: What does Ross say about getting beaten up?
options: It's something every man has to go through once in his life
It's something to be afraid of
questions.correct_answer: It's something every man has to go through once in his life
questions.explanation: Ross says that getting beaten up is 'something every man has to go through once in his life', making it sound like a necessary experience.

questions.question: What does Phoebe's half-brother say about their father?
options: He didn't talk about anything except stilts
questions.correct_answer: He didn't talk about anything except stilts
questions.explanation: Phoebe's half-brother says that their father didn't talk about anything except stilts, which were a favorite hobby of his.

questions.question: What is the name of the song that plays at the 50's theme restaurant?
questions.correct_answer: YMCA
questions.explanation: The song 'YMCA' by the Village People plays at the 50's theme restaurant, prompting the staff to get on the counter and dance.

questions.question: What does Chandler do with the hat after the fight?
options: He puts it back on his head
He tries to get it back from the bullies
He slips and falls while trying to get it
questions.correct_answer: He slips and falls while trying to get it
questions.explanation: Chandler tries to get his hat back from the bullies after the fight, but ends up slipping and falling behind the couch.

questions.question: What does Phoebe say to her half-brother about buying him beer?
questions.correct_answer: I won't buy you beer
questions.explanation: Phoebe tells her half-brother that she won't buy him beer, despite him saying that she can now buy him beer since she's his big sister.

questions.question: What does Monica say about her stock, MEG?
questions.correct_answer: It went up 2 points
questions.explanation: Monica says that her stock, MEG, went up 2 points, which makes her happy and motivates her to invest more.

questions.question: What does Joey say about the dog after it's been injured?
options: It's okay, it's just a little hurt
It's going to be okay, it just needs stitches
questions.correct_answer: The threshold's clear now
questions.explanation: Joey says 'The threshold's clear now' after the dog has been injured, making a dark joke about the situation.
